title: Butternut squash and lentil soup with bone broth
ingredients: ['200g lentils', '1 onion', '1 whole garlic bulb', '2.5cm piece root ginger', '1 butternut squash', '1 tablespoon coconut oil or clarified butter', '750ml to 1L homemade chicken bone broth', 'unprocessed salt (Himalayan, Celtic, etc.), to taste', 'black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon ground cumin or coriander (or a mix)', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric']
